body:
Hi,

late August would be good for me as well.
If I'm right Velux changed the date for their daylight symposium to
September 2-3, so this might be a reason to avoid these days?

Best,
David

2014-11-07 21:41 GMT+01:00 Shakespeare, Robert A. <shakespe at indiana.edu>:
